description: Returns the level for a GEO code in the NUTS classification or if it is considered aggregates.
Returns info of the dataflows provided by EUROSTAT Providers.
Returns the list of supported EUROSTAT API Endpoints.
example: SELECT provider_id, organization, description FROM EUROSTAT_Endpoints();

description: Returns information of the data structure of an EUROSTAT Dataflow.
Returns the dataset of an EUROSTAT Dataflow.
